sessions.name: Q & A
sessions.description: Here's your chance to ask the Dream On Team your questions

speakers.name: Ben Swartz
speakers.about: Ben is the Co-Founder and President of Dream On. He also is a Dream On: Speaker Collective International Speaker
speakers.title: President & Co-Founder of Dream On

speakers.name: Ashley Powell
speakers.about: Ashley is a Co-Host of the DO Moms Podcast and Dream On: Speaker Collective International Speaker
speakers.title: Executive Director of Outreach

speakers.name: Hanna Swartz
speakers.about: Hanna is a Co-Host of the DO Moms Podcast and Dream On: Speaker Collective Speaker
speakers.title: Chief Financial Officer

speakers.name: Daniel Lucien
speakers.about: Pastor Daniel Lucien serves as Lead Pastor at Fostoria Church of God, is an International Speaker and Dream On Event Coordinator
speakers.title: Director of Pastoral Dreaming

speakers.name: Lucas Gray
speakers.about: Lucas Gray and his wife Lilli serve as the Worship Pastors at Lima First Church of God and a Dream On: Music Collective Artists
speakers.title: Music Collective Artist

speakers.name: Lilli Gray
speakers.about: Lilli Gray and her husband Lucas serve as the Worship Pastors at Lima First Church of God and a Dream On: Music Collective Artists
speakers.title: Music Collective Artist

speakers.name: Derek Spencer
speakers.about: Derek Spencer serves as the Student Pastor at Real Life Church in Bowling Green, Kentucky and a Dream On: Music Collective Artist
speakers.title: Music Collective Artist

speakers.name: John Peak
speakers.about: John Peak serves as the Director of Television & Media at Higher Ground Baptist Church in Bristol, Tennesse as well as the Director of Media at Dream On
speakers.title: Director of Media

speakers.name: Ty Watson
speakers.about: Ty Watson serves as a Pastor at New Life Church in Siloam Springs Arkansas and Dream On: Speaker Collective Speaker
speakers.title: Speaker Collective Speaker

speakers.name: Rob Kennedy
speakers.about: Rob Kennedy serves as the Senior Pastor at The Rock Community Church & Transformation Center in Saint Petersburg Florida as well as Dream On: Speaker Collective International Speaker and Author
speakers.title: Speaker Collective Speaker

speakers.name: Judy Zircher
speakers.about: Judy Zircher is the Abstinence Educator at Relationships Under Construction as well as the Founder of Purity Ally and Dream On: Speaker Collective Speaker and Author
speakers.title: Speaker Collective Speaker
